props.name: fieldId
props.doc: The id of the hidden field required for storing the current history token.

props.name: iframeId
props.doc: The id of the iframe required by IE to manage the history stack.

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

events.name: change
events.doc: Fires when navigation back or forwards within the local page's history occurs.

events.name: ready
events.doc: Fires when the CQ.Ext.History singleton has been initialized and is ready for use.
